13:23:47</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var cmd = './hcli token transfer'
var transfer if (inputs.amount.toString() != "") { transfer = [{ from: inputs.from.account_id.toString(), to: inputs.to.account_id.toString(), token_id: inputs.token_id.toString(), amount: inputs.amount.toString() }] }
if (inputs.serial.toString() != "") { transfer = [{ from: inputs.from.account_id.toString(), to: inputs.account_id.toString(), token_id: inputs.token_id.token_id.toString(), serial: inputs.nft.serial.toString() }] }
cmd = cmd + ' --transfers \'' + JSON.stringify(transfer) + '\''
if (sign_with) { while (sign_with.next()) { cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + sign_with.public_key } }
outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value if (response.receipt ) { outputs.hstatus = response.receipt.status // outputs.account_id = response.receipt.accountId // outputs.token_id = response.receipt.tokenId // outputs.serials = response.receipt.serials // outputs.topic_id = response.receipt.topicId } else { fail = true }

if (response.error) { outputs.hstatus = response.error.status fail = true }
outputs.fail = fail
